panels.content:
Welcome to Linux Kernel CI report database (**KCIDB**) dashboard.
Here you can find testing reports aggregated from multiple CI systems ("**origins**"), sent in the past six months.
This is a work in progress, and we welcome contributions and participation.
See the source code for [the collection system][kcidb], and for [this dashboard][kcidb-grafana].
Write to [kernelci@lists.linux.dev][maillist] if you want to start submitting results from your CI system,
or if you want to receive customized notifications of arriving results.

[kcidb]: https://github.com/kernelci/kcidb/
[kcidb-grafana]: https://github.com/kernelci/kcidb-grafana/
[maillist]: mailto:kernelci@lists.linux.dev
panels.title: Welcome

targets.rawSql:
/* Massage */
SELECT
    CASE WHEN $origin = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $origin END AS origin_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_architecture = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_architecture END AS build_architecture_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_config_name = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_config_name END AS build_config_name_param,
    git_repository_url,
    COALESCE(
        CASE WHEN ARRAY_LENGTH(git_repository_branches, 1) <= 3
        THEN ARRAY_TO_STRING(git_repository_branches, ', ')
        ELSE
            (
                SELECT STRING_AGG(branch, ', ') || ' (+' || (ARRAY_LENGTH(git_repository_branches, 1) - 3) || ')'
                FROM (
                    SELECT branch FROM UNNEST(git_repository_branches) AS branch ORDER BY branch DESC LIMIT 3
                ) AS three_branches
            )
        END,
        ''
    ) AS git_repository_branches_string,
    COALESCE(checkouts, 0) AS checkouts
FROM (
    /* Aggregate */
    SELECT git_repository_url, git_repository_branches, checkouts
    FROM (
        SELECT DISTINCT git_repository_url
        FROM checkouts
        WHERE git_repository_url IS NOT NULL
    ) AS git_repositories
    LEFT OUTER JOIN (
        SELECT
            git_repository_url,
            ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT git_repository_branch) AS git_repository_branches,
            COUNT(id) AS checkouts
        FROM checkouts
        WHERE
            start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
            origin LIKE $origin
        GROUP BY git_repository_url
    ) AS git_repository_branches_and_checkout_counts USING(git_repository_url)
) AS distinct_git_repositories_branches_and_checkout_counts
ORDER BY checkouts DESC, git_repository_url ASC

/* Aggregate */
SELECT
    CASE WHEN $origin = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $origin END AS origin_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_architecture = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_architecture END AS build_architecture_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_config_name = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_config_name END AS build_config_name_param,
    STRING_AGG(DISTINCT origin, ', ') AS origins,
    LEFT(base_prefix, CHAR_LENGTH(base_prefix) - 1) AS path,
    STRING_AGG(DISTINCT architecture, ', ') AS architectures,
    COUNT(id) AS tests,
    MAX(COALESCE(array_position(ARRAY['SKIP', 'DONE', 'PASS', 'MISS', 'ERROR', 'FAIL'], status::text), 0) - COALESCE(waived::int, 2) * 7) AS status_num
FROM (
    /* Filter tests and extract path prefixes */
    SELECT
        tests.origin,
        tests.id,
        /* The topmost prefix of the test path */
        COALESCE(
            /* Cut the test path up to and including the first dot */
            LEFT(tests.path, NULLIF(POSITION('.' IN SUBSTRING(tests.path FROM 2)), 0) + 1),
            tests.path || '.'
        ) AS base_prefix,
        builds.architecture,
        tests.status AS status,
        tests.waived AS waived
    FROM tests
    INNER JOIN
        builds
        ON
            builds.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
            ($origin = '%' or builds.origin LIKE $origin) AND
            tests.build_id = builds.id AND
            ($build_architecture = '%' OR builds.architecture LIKE $build_architecture) AND
            ($build_config_name = '%' OR builds.config_name LIKE $build_config_name)
    WHERE
        tests.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
        ($origin = '%' or tests.origin LIKE $origin) AND
        tests.path IS NOT NULL AND
        tests.path != ''
) AS filtered_tests
GROUP BY
    base_prefix
ORDER BY
    tests DESC,
    base_prefix ASC

/*
 * Truncate a string with an ellipsis at speÑified length.
 */
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION pg_temp.TRUNCATE(str TEXT, len INT)
RETURNS TEXT AS $$
BEGIN
    IF len = 0 OR CHAR_LENGTH(str) <= len THEN
        RETURN str;
    ELSE
        RETURN SUBSTRING(str FROM 1 FOR len - 1) || 'â€¦';
    END IF;
END;
$$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;

/*
 * Replace NULL or empty string with a non-breaking space,
 * truncate anything else with ellipsis, if necessary.
 */
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION pg_temp.BLANK_OR_TRUNCATE(str TEXT, len INT)
RETURNS TEXT AS $$
BEGIN
    IF str IS NULL OR str = '' THEN
        RETURN ' ';
    ELSE
        RETURN pg_temp.TRUNCATE(str, len);
    END IF;
END;
$$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;

/*
 * Format an array of strings as a three-line text with ellipsis
 */
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION pg_temp.ARRAY_TO_TEXT(strs TEXT[], width INT)
RETURNS TEXT AS $$
BEGIN
    RETURN CONCAT_WS(
        E'\n',
        pg_temp.BLANK_OR_TRUNCATE(strs[1], width),
        pg_temp.BLANK_OR_TRUNCATE(strs[2], width),
        CASE WHEN array_length(strs, 1) > 3 THEN 'â€¦' ELSE pg_temp.BLANK_OR_TRUNCATE(strs[3], width) END
    );
END;
$$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;

WITH
    filtered_checkouts AS (
        SELECT
            id,
            origin,
            git_commit_hash,
            patchset_hash,
            git_repository_url,
            git_repository_branch,
            git_commit_name,
            start_time,
            valid
        FROM
            checkouts
        WHERE
            checkouts.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
            ($origin = '%' OR checkouts.origin LIKE $origin)
    ),
    revision_sources AS (
        SELECT
            git_commit_hash,
            patchset_hash,
            pg_temp.ARRAY_TO_TEXT(
                ARRAY_AGG(git_repository_url_str
                          ORDER BY rank DESC, git_repository_url_str,
                                   git_repository_branch_str, git_commit_name_str),
                128
            ) AS git_repository_urls_text,
            pg_temp.ARRAY_TO_TEXT(
                ARRAY_AGG(git_repository_branch_str
                          ORDER BY rank DESC, git_repository_url_str,
                                   git_repository_branch_str, git_commit_name_str),
                32
            ) AS git_repository_branches_text,
            pg_temp.ARRAY_TO_TEXT(
                ARRAY_AGG(git_commit_name_str
                          ORDER BY rank DESC, git_repository_url_str,
                                   git_repository_branch_str, git_commit_name_str),
                32
            ) AS git_commit_names_text
        FROM (
            SELECT
                git_commit_hash,
                patchset_hash,
                git_repository_url_str,
                git_repository_branch_str,
                git_commit_name_str,
                CASE WHEN git_repository_url_str = '' THEN 0 ELSE 4 END +
                    CASE WHEN git_repository_branch_str = '' THEN 0 ELSE 2 END +
                    CASE WHEN git_commit_name_str = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS rank
            FROM (
                SELECT DISTINCT
                    git_commit_hash,
                    patchset_hash,
                    COALESCE(git_repository_url, '') AS git_repository_url_str,
                    COALESCE(git_repository_branch, '') AS git_repository_branch_str,
                    COALESCE(git_commit_name, '') AS git_commit_name_str
                FROM
                    filtered_checkouts
            ) AS distinct_revisions_with_info
        ) AS ranked_distinct_revisions_with_info
        GROUP BY
            git_commit_hash,
            patchset_hash
    )
/* Massage and join with sources */
SELECT
    CASE WHEN $origin = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $origin END AS origin_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_architecture = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_architecture END AS build_architecture_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_config_name = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_config_name END AS build_config_name_param,
    revisions.git_commit_hash,
    revisions.patchset_hash,
    origins_str,
    LEFT(revisions.git_commit_hash, 12) AS git_commit_hash_short,
    revision_sources.git_repository_urls_text,
    revision_sources.git_repository_branches_text,
    revision_sources.git_commit_names_text,
    LEFT(revisions.patchset_hash, 12) AS patchset_hash_short,
    COALESCE(CAST(checkouts_start_time AS TEXT), '') AS checkouts_start_time_str,
    checkouts_valid_num,
    builds_valid_num,
    tests_status_num
FROM (
    /* Calculate revision statuses */
    SELECT
        checkouts.git_commit_hash,
        checkouts.patchset_hash,
        STRING_AGG(DISTINCT checkouts.origin, ', ') AS origins_str,
        MIN(checkouts.start_time) AS checkouts_start_time,
        CASE MIN(checkouts.valid::int) WHEN 0 THEN 1 WHEN 1 THEN 0 ELSE -1 END AS checkouts_valid_num,
        CASE MIN(builds.valid::int) WHEN 0 THEN 1 WHEN 1 THEN 0 ELSE -1 END AS builds_valid_num,
        MAX(COALESCE(array_position(ARRAY['SKIP', 'DONE', 'PASS', 'MISS', 'ERROR', 'FAIL'], tests.status::text), 0) - COALESCE(tests.waived::int, 2) * 7) AS tests_status_num
    FROM
        filtered_checkouts AS checkouts
    LEFT OUTER JOIN
        builds
        ON
            builds.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
            ($origin = '%' OR builds.origin LIKE $origin) AND
            builds.checkout_id = checkouts.id AND
            ($build_architecture = '%' OR builds.architecture LIKE $build_architecture) AND
            ($build_config_name = '%' OR builds.config_name LIKE $build_config_name)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN
        tests
        ON
            tests.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
            ($origin = '%' OR tests.origin LIKE $origin) AND
            tests.build_id = builds.id
    GROUP BY
        checkouts.git_commit_hash,
        checkouts.patchset_hash
) AS revisions
INNER JOIN
    revision_sources
    ON
        revision_sources.git_commit_hash = revisions.git_commit_hash AND
        revision_sources.patchset_hash = revisions.patchset_hash
ORDER BY
    checkouts_start_time DESC

SELECT
    date_bin(($__interval_ms * 50 || ' milliseconds')::interval,
             builds.start_time,
             TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000)) AS time,
    CASE
        WHEN builds.valid IS TRUE THEN 'PASS'
        WHEN builds.valid IS FALSE THEN 'FAIL'
        ELSE 'UNKNOWN'
    END AS metric,
    COUNT(builds.id) AS builds
FROM builds
WHERE
  builds.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
  ($origin = '%' or builds.origin LIKE $origin) AND
  ($build_architecture = '%' OR builds.architecture LIKE $build_architecture) AND
  ($build_config_name = '%' OR builds.config_name LIKE $build_config_name)
GROUP BY time, builds.valid
ORDER BY time

SELECT
    date_bin(($__interval_ms * 50 || ' milliseconds')::interval,
             tests.start_time,
             TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000)) AS time,
    COALESCE(tests.status::text, 'UNKNOWN') AS metric,
    COUNT(tests.id) AS tests
FROM tests
INNER JOIN builds ON builds.id = tests.build_id
WHERE
    tests.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
    NOT tests.waived AND
    ($origin = '%' or tests.origin LIKE $origin) AND
    ($build_architecture = '%' OR builds.architecture LIKE $build_architecture) AND
    ($build_config_name = '%' OR builds.config_name LIKE $build_config_name)
GROUP BY
    time, metric
ORDER BY
    time

SELECT
    COALESCE(checkouts.time, builds.time, tests.time) AS time,
    COALESCE(checkouts.count, 0) AS Checkouts,
    COALESCE(builds.count, 0) AS Builds,
    COALESCE(tests.count, 0) AS Tests
FROM (
    SELECT
        date_bin(($__interval_ms * 50 || ' milliseconds')::interval,
                 start_time, TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000)) AS time,
        COUNT(id) AS count
    FROM
        checkouts
    WHERE
        ($origin = '%' or origin LIKE $origin) AND
        start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000)
    GROUP BY
        time
) AS checkouts
FULL OUTER JOIN (
    SELECT
        date_bin(($__interval_ms * 50 || ' milliseconds')::interval,
                 start_time, TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000)) AS time,
        COUNT(id) AS count
    FROM builds
    WHERE
        ($origin = '%' or origin LIKE $origin) AND
    	start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
        ($build_architecture = '%' OR builds.architecture LIKE $build_architecture) AND
        ($build_config_name = '%' OR builds.config_name LIKE $build_config_name)
    GROUP BY
        time
) AS builds ON builds.time = checkouts.time
FULL OUTER JOIN (
    SELECT
        date_bin(($__interval_ms * 50 || ' milliseconds')::interval,
                 start_time, TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000)) AS time,
        COUNT(id) AS count
    FROM tests
    WHERE
        ($origin = '%' or origin LIKE $origin) AND
    	start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000)
    GROUP BY
        time
) AS tests ON tests.time = COALESCE(checkouts.time, builds.time)
ORDER BY
    time

SELECT
    date_bin(($__interval_ms * 50 || ' milliseconds')::interval,
             builds.start_time,
             TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000)) AS time,
    COALESCE(builds.architecture, 'UNKNOWN') AS metric,
    COUNT(builds.id) AS Builds
FROM
    builds
WHERE
    builds.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
    ($origin = '%' or builds.origin LIKE $origin) AND
    ($build_architecture = '%' OR builds.architecture LIKE $build_architecture) AND
    ($build_config_name = '%' OR builds.config_name LIKE $build_config_name)
GROUP BY
    time, metric
ORDER BY
    time
